name: MSC - Stark NE Tour
description:
The MSC Stark Northeast Tour provides delegates the opportunity to visit some of the nation’s most outstanding and prestigious business and law schools in Chicago, Boston, New York, and Philadelphia. In the late 1960s, longtime MSC Director J. Wayne Stark recognized a need to give top Texas A&M students access to the nation’s premier law and graduate business programs. It was also important that the trip be available at a cost that wouldn’t break the typical student’s family budget. Stark called on the considerable power of his Aggie network to make that first trip happen in 1970.

Delegates will visit the University of Chicago, Northwestern, Harvard, New York University, Columbia University, and the University of Pennsylvania. This trip will afford you the opportunity to meet with the recruiting administrators and current students of the schools, as well as network with former students at various receptions and events. You will also be able to observe actual law and business classes and tour the campuses and cities.

2017 MSC Stark Northeast Trip: January 6-16, 2018

Login to Maroon Link, then apply at bit.ly/StarkNE2018.

Applications due at noon, September 24, 2017.

stark@msc.tamu.edu
summary: Prospective Law & MBA students visit U Chicago, Northwestern, Harvard, NYU, Columbia, and U Penn. Meet  admissions and current law/MBA students, observe classes, tour campuses, as well as attend networking events with former students in each city.
